thread.title: rebecca20
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by rebecca20

author: rebecca20
title: rebecca20
text:
I ordered a pair of Wellington boots,they arrived extremely quickly. Unfortunately I had ordered a size too small so sent back (free returns which is a bonus) my refund was processed very swiftly and I re-ordered the next size up which arrived two days later and fit perfectly.
Would definitely recommend.
